scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.start-up: npm install -D webpack webpack-cli && npx webpack && npm install -D html-webpack-plugin && npx webpack && npm install -D style-loader css-loader && npx webpack && npm install -D html-loader && npx webpack && npm install -D webpack-dev-server && npx webpack
scripts.prettier-setup:
npm install -D --save-exact prettier && node --eval 'fs.writeFileSync('.prettierrc','{}
')' && node --eval `fs.writeFileSync('.prettierignore','# Ignore artifacts:
build
coverage
')` && npx webpack
